@jisampedro @Fly_Norwegian Nope.
“Learn Node.js — Top 3 Online Node Courses” by @BrandonMorelli https://t.co/UrRu1v9I0W
9 hours to travel from my office in London to my house in Barcelona. Courtesy of @Fly_Norwegian https://t.co/jvmHqjpQ7a

@Fly_Norwegian Still, it's 21:01 and our 19:20 flight is still on the ground. If you don't think we deserve an explanation, that's okay, but me and my company won't be flying with you ever again. Thanks.

So we were supposed to leave at 20:10 (now) but we haven't even boarded yet. No explanation yet -I don't expect anything at this point. I'll just be patient, fly home, and ban @Fly_Norwegian from my company's trips. I'll get to Barcelona late and metro will be closed.

Hey @Fly_Norwegian, your website still says the flight is on time, but I see at the airport screen that it's been delayed (and I first saw it an hour ago). Why don't you inform your customers? Total disrespect and disregard for us. #delay #flight #norwegian https://t.co/9Ub3bzsxSX

@AirCollect_FR @Fly_Norwegian Only three hours? So if Norwegian Airlines leaves me hanging 1 hour without explanation, 2 flights in a row, I can't do anything? Other than not flying with them ever again? It wasn't the cheapest flight at by far, and I had suffered delays both ways 😡😡😡😡 https://t.co/2OYMbwZDoa
@Fly_Norwegian And now my flight back to Barcelona is delayed again for no reason and no explanation??? 1 hour later. This is unacceptable, I won't be flying with you anymore. https://t.co/1djrcYaWUI
